rows.label: bf03200100_0010
rows.name: How is she?

rows.label: bf03200100_0020
rows.name:
She's not badly hurt.
Byakko thinks she just needs rest.

rows.label: bf03200100_0030
rows.name: That's good to hear.

rows.label: bf03200100_0040
rows.name: Maybe...I used too much power again...

rows.label: bf03200100_0050
rows.name: Hey, Rex...

rows.label: bf03200100_0060
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Hmm?

rows.label: bf03200100_0070
rows.name:
Know what the difference is between me
and that Yoshitsune fella?

rows.label: bf03200100_0080
rows.name:
Well, he's a bad guy, trying to get
Homura...and you're...a good guy?

rows.label: bf03200100_0090
rows.name:
Hehe! Thanks for the
vote of confidence, kid.

rows.label: bf03200100_0100
rows.name:
What if I told you that we weren't
that different?

rows.label: bf03200100_0110
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: bf03200100_0120
rows.name:
My crew at the village, we think we're
fighting for justice.

rows.label: bf03200100_0130
rows.name:
But, a just fight? 
I'm telling you now, there's no such thing.

rows.label: bf03200100_0140
rows.name:
What people call justice? It's just an excuse to fight.
War is war.

rows.label: bf03200100_0150
rows.name:
The more you stand up for yourself,
the more people wanna fight you.

rows.label: bf03200100_0160
rows.name: Before you know it, you're in a war.

rows.label: bf03200100_0170
rows.name:
Listen. All I'm saying is, we got our fight,
and he's got his.

rows.label: bf03200100_0180
rows.name: But what he's doing is-

rows.label: bf03200100_0190
rows.name:
Yeah, it's bad. But war ain't about right and wrong.
Power. That's all it is.

rows.label: bf03200100_0200
rows.name:
And power can take many different forms.
It depends on the heart of its wielder.

rows.label: bf03200100_0210
rows.name:
If we don't use our power, just 'cos
we're scared of it, we're done for.

rows.label: bf03200100_0220
rows.name:
As for who's right and who's wrong...
No one knows for sure.

rows.label: bf03200100_0230
rows.name:
So, all we can do, is protect what's
important.

rows.label: bf03200100_0240
rows.name: What's important...

rows.label: bf03200100_0250
rows.name: That's your war.

rows.label: bf03200100_0260
rows.name: My...war?
